0.11.name: wordpress/wp-linkchanger
0.11.description:
WP-LinkChanger is a small script for affiliate link masking. That means all of your affiliate links in a post will automatically be changed to an internal file.

After installation all links of your new posts can look like http://your.domain.tld/exit.php instead of http://evil.affiliatelink.com/ref/id/123
